definition: root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)
according to/to act in accordance with/to depend on/to seize/to occupy
according to provisions/as stipulated in the rules

sentences.english: On the grounds of modern emergency medicine, defibrillation has to be performed in combination with CPR.
sentences.chinese: 根据现代急救理念，电除颤必须与心肺复苏联合应用。

sentences.english: Prices are differents depend on the type.
sentences.chinese: 价格根据型号有所不同。

sentences.english: The direction of light reflected from an object depends on its alignment.
sentences.chinese: 光线的方向会根据对象的位置发生反射。

sentences.english: Deciding microwave anechoic chamber dimensions in terms of measurement project and EUT(equipment under test) dimensions.
sentences.chinese: 根据测试项目和被测件的大小，决定暗室的尺寸。

sentences.english: What I wear depends on the time of the day and thd places that I am going to.
sentences.chinese: 我的穿着是根据当天的时刻和我要去的地点来决定。

sentences.english: That's according to a new AP Ipsos poll.
sentences.chinese: 这是根据最新的美联社依普索民意调查得出的结论。

sentences.english: Interphase is divisible into various stages each characterized by a differing physiological activity.
sentences.chinese: 根据细胞生理活性差异可以把间期分成不同的阶段。

sentences.english: Later, those boats were heavily outrun by modern ships.
sentences.chinese: 稍后，那些船很重地根据现代船跑得更快。

sentences.english: If issues remain, they are reallocated based on their type.
sentences.chinese: 如果仍然有问题，则会根据其类型进行重新分配。

sentences.english: Yes. A specific subject-selection system allows the training coordinator to select relevant subjects for each target group.
sentences.chinese: 可以根据每一个目标群设定相关的培训主题。

sentences.english: The dosages of two drugs were adjusted according to blood pressure change.
sentences.chinese: 根据血压控制情况调整两组的降压药剂量。

sentences.english: Under the budget proposal, hedge-fund managers would be taxed at higher rates.
sentences.chinese: 根据预算方案，对冲基金经理将按更高的税率缴税。

sentences.english: According to Alice Hibberd film adapted from a best-selling novel.
sentences.chinese: 本片根据爱丽丝希伯德的畅销小说改编而成。

sentences.english: Search results are categorized and filtered according to the value of these properties.
sentences.chinese: 将根据这些属性筛选搜索结果或对其进行分类。

sentences.english: Thereby , the basis of penal responsibility of ministration defect sin is varied .
sentences.chinese: 职务过失犯罪刑事责任的根据呈多元性的特点。

sentences.english: My friend said he could always arrange his schedule around your schedule.
sentences.chinese: 我朋友说他可以根据你的课程表来调整他上课的时间。

definition: according to/in accordance with/in the light of/on the basis of
to consult a reference/to refer to (another document)
definite/certain/fixed/to fix (on sth)/to determine/to be sure/to ensure/to make certain/to ascertain/to clinch/to recognize/to confirm/OK (on computer dialog box)
according to/to act in accordance with/to depend on/to seize/to occupy
according to this/on the ground of the above/(formally introduces reported speech in writing)
to correspond/answering (one another)/to agree (among the part)/corresponding/relevant/appropriate/(modify) accordingly
to press/to push/to leave aside or shelve/to control/to restrain/to keep one's hand on/to check or refer to/according to/in the light of/(of an editor or author) to make a comment
